# PESEL – personal identification number – Welcome Point

URL: https://wtp.agh.edu.pl/pesel-number/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:23:46

Welcome Point
 > 
Legal arrangements
 > 
PESEL – personal identification number

PESEL – personal identification number

PESEL number is a unique personal identification number that every Polish citizen must have. It is required for example to open a bank account, submit your annual tax declaration, or makes it easier to use medical services. It starts with your date of birth

How to get a PESEL number?

PESEL is automatically assigned to you when you register at municipality/district office.

It is mandatory for all incoming visitors who are staying:

for more than 3 months → for EU/EEA citizens

for more than 30 days → for all other nationalities

PESEL number is useful to manage certain formalities such as opening a bank account, registering for a doctor or submitting your annual tax declaration.
